channel.title: Virus help plz
channel.description: ok i just downloaded googlescapes server and when i scanned it, it scanned this virus Trojan.Win32.KillFiles.lj. SInce im new to the whole virus thing can someone tell me how to get ride of it, or by just deleting the file i just downlaoded it deleted the virus. plz help im begging

item.title: Virus help plz
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

First of all, download norton 360 trial from here.
http://shop.symantecstore.com/servlet/ControllerServlet?Action=ContentTheme&Locale=en_US&SiteID=symnahho&ThemeID=106300&pbPage=Trialware_en_US&pgm=12858600

Then scan your computer, and at the end a screen will come up that lets you remove the virus. After that your computer will be clean.

Read full topic
